body: @stefanomemrise Can you include a source mapped stack trace? I can't debug anything without a repro or a stack trace.

Fatal Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException
       at com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer.<init>(SourceFile:8120)
       at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.b(SourceFile:201)
       at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setComposition(SourceFile:11164)
       at com.memrise.android.memrisecompanion.ui.presenter.view.FlowerView$$Lambda$0.a(Unknown Source:1029)
       at com.memrise.android.memrisecompanion.ui.util.WordDrawableMapper$$Lambda$0.a(Unknown Source:1053)
       at com.airbnb.lottie.model.FileCompositionLoader.onPostExecute(SourceFile:1024)
       at android.os.AsyncTask.finish(AsyncTask.java:632)
       at android.os.AsyncTask.access$600(AsyncTask.java:177)
       at android.os.AsyncTask$InternalHandler.handleMessage(AsyncTask.java:645)
       at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:110)
       at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:193)
       at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:5341)

       at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:515)

       at dalvik.system.NativeStart.main(NativeStart.java)
Also, it's only happening on Android 4.x
@stefanomemrise This still isn't source mapped. The line numbers aren't correct.

@yangheng09103 @stefanomemrise Can you attach the animation that crashes? Does it crash 100% of the time?

@yangheng09103 does yours only crash on 4.x like @stefanomemrise?
It's not 100% of the time.It's only happened on 4.x.I got this crash from fabric after lottie updated to v2.3.0.This crash is new since 2.3.0.Most of the crash are come from Android 4.4.2.

issue.title: NullPointerException--phone model:Micromax A120,lottie version 2.3.0

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

@stefanomemrise @yangheng09103 @magic1983 
I can't repro this. It would be really helpful to have a sample project or even a link number for the actual crash `at com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer.(CompositionLayer.java)`
In our case it looks like it was related to the D8 compiler of gradle. After switching back to DX it never happened again. Hope this helps.

I find out that code revision 3867cdd is match the crash trace from the Fabric 
Crashlytics log.
`Fatal Exception: java.lang.NullPointerException
com.airbnb.lottie.model.layer.CompositionLayer. (CompositionLayer.java:70)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.buildCompositionLayer (LottieDrawable.java:195)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.setComposition (LottieDrawable.java:156)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setComposition (LottieAnimationView.java:461)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView$3.onCompositionLoaded (LottieAnimationView.java:426)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.model.FileCompositionLoader.onPostExecute (FileCompositionLoader.java:24)
  | com.airbnb.lottie.model.FileCompositionLoader.onPostExecute (FileCompositionLoader.java:10)`

The crashed code should be 
`BaseLayer parentLayer = layerMap.get(layerView.getLayerModel().getParentId());`
It looks like `layerView.getLayerModel()` was null at some time.
@yangheng09103 @magic1983 Are you using D8 as well?
